# Pull Request: Summary

- Provide a brief description of the change and the problem it solves.



- ## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Docs only


## Checklist

- [ ] I have followed the `.github/copilot-instructions.md` for code generation patterns
- [ ] I added/updated unit tests consistent with existing patterns
- [ ] I updated config or defaults in `config.py` and `config.example.yaml` when needed
- [ ] I updated the `README.md` or `PROJECT_STATUS.md` if this is a user-visible change
- [ ] I verified that my changes do not introduce new Python or library version dependencies
- [ ] I checked that tests pass locally: `.\run_tests.ps1` (or `pytest`)
- [ ] I added relevant documentation or comments for future maintainers


## Copilot / AI Use Statement

- [ ] I used an AI tool (e.g., Copilot, Zencoder) to generate code or suggestions
- [ ] I verified all AI-generated code for compatibility, security, and tests
- [ ] I explicitly followed `.github/copilot-instructions.md` and `.github/AI_POLICY.md` when using AI tools

## Additional Notes

Add any other context, migration steps, or special deployment instructions.
